conbody.p: This is the first release of .

dlentry.dd: If you have worked with Cloud Foundry before, will allow you to work in a familiar environment that uses Terraform, a service management command-line tool, instead of BOSH.

If you have worked with the HP Helion Development Platform before, will allow you to work in a familiar environment that uses gato, a new command-line administration utility, instead of kato. For more information, see the .
